name: Gale Reef
description: Gale Reef is a fabulous diving destination! Resorts also frequently have low cost massages and a wonderful beach view.

name: Dawson's Reef
description: Dawson's Reef is a must see. Exotic fish, fun cocktails, and truly breathtaking scenery are on full display.

name: Claire's Reef
description: Claire's Reef is a vivid reimagining of just how wonderful you vacation could be.
